message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. My initial asking price is $950000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you. I'm open to discussing your thoughts and exploring options.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping we could discuss a lower price. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your interest. While I'm willing to negotiate, $850000 doesn't quite reflect the value this product brings to your business. I'm prepared to come down to $900000. This price still leaves room for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $880000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest. I'm ready to make a final concession.  I'm willing to accept $890000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for your company.  It's time for us to reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make a final concession, but $890000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $870000 for the product. I believe this price is the best we can reach considering the value it holds for my company.

Bob, we're close to a deal, but I need to be sure we're both getting what we need.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $880000.  This is my final offer. If you accept, we can finalize the transaction and both walk away happy.  If not, we'll have to part ways.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for my company.
